title: links for 2006-02-05
content:
• Anne 2.0: Ning: Great for Mediocre Programmers
    "I spent some time playing with Ning today. I couldn't believe how easy it was to parse an OPML file and display it on a web page."
    (tags: ning webdev)
  • Scripting News: 2/3/2006 - It's a different world today
    "But none of that means that I can't find enough users for my aggregator, and you for yours, to be able to continue development and influence the market, because we don't have to convince the editors of PC Mag and PC Week that our products matter. ... Now
    (tags: nifty webdev programming syndication rss aggregators)
  • BBC NEWS | Technology | Gaming glamour tempts tennis pro
    "Scotsman David Kinnaird is swapping his tennis racket for a railgun."
    (tags: gaming quake)
  • Wymsey Weekend: A Guide to Mobile Cooking
    "we show you how to use two mobile phones to cook an egg which will make a change from phoning out for a pizza." Eggs == brains?
    (tags: mobile cooking)
  • Nelson's Weblog: culture / games / emulation / noahsArk3D
    "Instead of a soldier shooting evil Nazis with machine guns, you're Noah lobbing sleep-inducing berries at unruly goats on the Ark. Yes, really."
    (tags: gaming snes id christianity)
  • BlogicBlog: View from the trenches: The techie way of liberating the podcast URL from iTunes
    "Jon Udell is not happy about having to transcribe podcast URLs that iTunes displays, but does not allow to copy. While the general point about lock-in is good, here is a quick techie workaround in a meanwhile."
    (tags: itunes stanford podcasts)
  • 01 - South Side of the Sky.mp3 (audio/mpeg Object)
    Awesome cover of Yes' "South Side of the Sky", with all parts done by one girl.
    (tags: nelljames mp3 music audio yes covers rock)
  • 04 - Madrigal.mp3 (audio/mpeg Object)
    Another Yes cover with Nell James doing all the parts
    (tags: nelljames music mp3 yes)
  • The Music of Nell James
    "Welcome to the official website of musician Nell James (previously known as Nell & the Nellettes), 17 year old multi-instrumentalist and composer."
    (tags: nelljames music)
  • NPR : Al Lewis, Beloved as 'Grandpa Munster,' Dies at 95
    "Al Lewis, the cigar-chomping patriarch of The Munsters whose work as a basketball scout, restaurateur and political candidate never eclipsed his role as Grandpa from the television sitcom, died after years of failing health. He was 95."
    (tags: sad)
  • O'Reilly Emerging Technology Conference - March 6-9, 2006 - San Diego, CA
    "> take proposal Okay. You have taken the proposal. "
    (tags: nifty grue conference etcon)
